Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
boogie \boogie\ n. 1. (Music) an instrumental version of the blues (especially for piano).
Syn: boogie-woogie. [WordNet 1.5]
2. a black person; -- offensive and disparaging. [slang] [PJC]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: boogie \boog"ie\ (b[oo^]"g[=e]), v. i. to do a lively dance, often with the two partners not touching, to the accompaniment of rock music. [PJC]
boogie n : an instrumental version of the blues (especially for piano) [syn: {boogie-woogie}]
